Detailed Description

Represents a __global__ function.

template<typename CudaKernelFunc>
cupp::kernel::kernel ( CudaKernelFunc  f,
const dim3 &  grid_dim,
const dim3 &  block_dim,
const size_t  shared_mem = 0,
const int  tokens = 0 
) [inline]

Constructor used to generate a kernel.

Parameters:
f A pointer to the kernel function
grid_dim The dimension of the grid, the kernel we be executed on
block_dim The dimension of the block, the kernel we be executed on
shared_mem The number of dynamic shared memory needed by this kernel (in bytes)
tokens
